articles.title: The Bachelorette Recap, Season 19 Episode 12: Finale Pt. 2 - Vulture
articles.description: Rachel and Tino give us simply the most baffling breakup in Bachelor Nation history, while Gabby and Erich are… fine, I guess. A recap of the season finale episode of The Bachelor season 19.
articles.content:
AAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!! WHYYYYY!!!!!! WHY IS THIS HAPPENING TO US????!!!!! CANT WE HAVE ANYTHING NICE!!!!!!?????!!
